attributes.action: Petition for Public Referendum on Illegal Migration
attributes.additional_details: The issue of illegal migration has become a focal point of national concern, impacting our society, economy, and security. It's imperative that the British public, whose lives and futures are directly affected by these policies, have a voice in deciding the path forward. A referendum on illegal migration would democratize this complex issue, giving citizens the power to shape policies that reflect their values and priorities.
attributes.background:
We propose that the government should hold a public referendum to determine whether the public supports:

Completely halting illegal migration, 
or 
Continuing to allow undocumented individuals into the country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Referendum on illegal migration.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711690
